articles.author: JOSH FUNK AP Business Writer
articles.title: Donald Trump's plan to seize Venezuela oil industry after Nicolas Maduro captured faces major hurdles - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: President Donald Trump's plan to take control of Venezuela's oil industry and ask American companies to revitalize it after capturing President Nicolás Maduro in a raid isn't likely to have a significant immediate impact on oil prices.
articles.content: CARACAS, Venezuela -- President Donald Trump's plan to take control of Venezuela's oil industry and ask American companies to revitalize it after capturing President Nicolás Maduro in a raid isn't li… [+5986 chars]
